title: 富有之后有木有感觉“钻石”贬值了？
author: WaraN_Neko
txt_content:
我的手机版Minecraft经过几天的刷钻石，终于有一大堆钻石块了{:10_492:}，全套钻石装，突然感觉钻石还没有石头“珍贵”{:10_514:}，你们觉得呢？


突然想删除存档 因为file:///c:/documents and settings/administrator/application data/360se6/User Data/temp/t0132abc8f3a1fcc369.pngfile:///c:/documents and settings/administrator/application data/360se6/User Data/temp/t0132abc8f3a1fcc369.pngfile:///c:/documents and settings/administrator/application data/360se6/User Data/temp/t0132abc8f3a1fcc369.pnghttp://p4.so.qhimg.com/bdr/_240_/t0132abc8f3a1fcc369.png <=http://p0.so.qhimg.com/bdr/_240_/t01ce78bf4efcbfdc05.jpg
